info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 02 at 3:42AM CST until February 03 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO NOON CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and mixed precipitation is expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Ice accumulations of around two tenths of an inch is possible. * WHERE...Borden, Scurry, Howard and Mitchell Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM this morning to noon CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 5 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A brief wintry mix of freezing rain and sleet is possible before transitioning to snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 800-452- 9292.
